channel.title: resistance to nonmagical damage on
channel.description: Recent content in resistance to nonmagical damage on

item.description: [[Armor of Invulnerability]] Armor (plate), legendary (requires attunement) You have resistance to nonmagical damage while you wear this armor. Additionally, you can use an action to make yourself immune to nonmagical damage for 10 minutes or until you are no longer wearing the armor.
